negotiator.parties

Class Annealer

  • java.lang.Object
    • genius.core.parties.AbstractNegotiationParty
      • negotiator.parties.Annealer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NegotiationParty, java.io.Serializable

    public class Annealer
extends AbstractNegotiationParty
    Implementation of a party that uses simulated annealing strategy to get to an agreement.

    This party should be run with MediatorProtocol

    Author:
    David Festen, Reyhan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Description copied from interface: NegotiationParty
        Initializes the party, informing it of many negotiation details. This MUST be called exactly once, immediately after construction of any class implementing this.

      • chooseAction

        public Action chooseAction(java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends Action>> possibleActions)
        When this class is called, it is expected that the Party chooses one of the actions from the possible action list and returns an instance of the chosen action. This class is only called if this NegotiationParty is in the .DefaultProtocol#getRoundStructure(java.util.List, negotiator.session.Session) .
        Parameters:
        possibleActions - List of all actions possible.
        Returns:
        The chosen action
